title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 146-2.13 - Student obtaining vocational experience
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 146-2.13 - Student obtaining vocational experience

State Regulations
A student is not deemed to be permitted or suffered to
work if, in order to fulfill the curriculum requirements of the educational
institution which the student attends, the student is required to obtain
supervised and directed vocational experience in another
establishment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
146-2.13

Amended

New

York State Register December 28, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 52, eff. 12/31/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
